original_text: for if someone does not know how to manage his own household, how will he care for God's church?
korean_text: (사람이 자기 집을 다스릴 줄 알지 못하면 어찌 하나님의 교회를 돌보리요)

sentences.original_text: for if someone does not know how to manage his own household
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 만일 어떤 사람이 자기 가정을 다스리는 법을 모르면

sentences.original_text: how will he care for God's church?
